sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Modal, Button, Form, Container } from "react-bootstrap";

function ModalView({
  nombre,
  apellido_paterno,
  apellido_materno,
  ci,
  genero,
  direccion,
}) {
  const [show, setShow] = useState(false);

  const handleClose = () => setShow(false);
  const handleShow = () => setShow(true);

  return (
    <>
      <Button variant="success" onClick={handleShow}>
        Modificar
      </Button>

      <Modal show={show} onHide={handleClose}>
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
          <Modal.Title>Modificar</Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        <Container fluid>
          <Form>
            <Form.Group controlId="formBasicEmail">
              <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                Modifique cuidadosamente
              </Form.Text>
              <Form.Label>Nombre</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" value={nombre} />
              <Form.Label>Apellido Paterno</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" value={apellido_paterno} />
              <Form.Label>Apellido Materno</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" value={apellido_materno} />
              <Form.Label>C.I</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" value={ci} />
              <Form.Group
                // as={}
                controlId="formGridState"
              >
                <Form.Label>Genero</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control as="select" value={genero}>
                  {genero === "Female" ? (
                    <option>Femenino</option>
                  ) : (
                    <option>Masculino</option>
                  )}
                </Form.Control>
              </Form.Group>

              <Form.Label>Direccion</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" value={direccion} />
            </Form.Group>
            <Button variant="primary" type="submit">
              Submit
            </Button>
          </Form>
        </Container>

        <Modal.Footer>
          <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleClose}>
            Close
          </Button>
          <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleClose}>
            Save Changes
          </Button>
        </Modal.Footer>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
}

export default ModalView;
